name: Across The Time
description:
Game made by Gaetan Poncelet and Esteban Rodriguez. Photography across the time was our inspiration and we're offering you a journey into the history of Gothenburg.

All assets were made by us during the jam we just took the font organic relief on dafont.com

Source : coming soon

Source code : https://github.com/Z3ZEL/GBG-Across-The-Time
